record.title: STAFF SERGEANT MARVIN "REX" YOUNG POST OFFICE BUILDING
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on the motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, H.R. 1425, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the bill.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Illinois (Mr. Davis) that the House suspend the rules and pass the bill, H.R. 1425.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, on Monday, May 21, 2007, I was absent from the House for medical reasons. Had I been present I would have voted: On rollcall No. 384-"yea"; on rollcall No. 385-"yea."
Mr. Speaker, I was unavoidably absent from this Chamber today. I would like the RECORD to show that, had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on rollcall votes 384 and 385.
